body.name: Organic Vitamin C | Whole Food Vitamin C from Fruit Plus Absorption Enhancing Cofactors - Vegan, Enhanced Bioavailability - Immune Support, Antioxidant, Total Health (90 Servings)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 9 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: ORGANIC VITAMIN C, WHOLE FOOD & RAW FORM: Plant-C is whole food vitamin C that is derived from the purest organic fruits. We are able to achieve such high concentrations of pure vitamin C due to the superior farming methods producing such high nutrient density within the fruit.
MAX STRENGTH - 250 mg PER CAPSULE: Plant C offers one of the the highest concentration of vitamin C in its natural form. One capsule has the same vitamin C levels as 4 organic Oranges.

ENHANCED WITH VITAMIN C COFACTORS: Plant-C is enhanced with Citrus Bioflavonoids & Rutin; both support overall vitamin c absorption, utilization and effectiveness in the body. Our whole food vitamin C also contains trace levels of other vitamin C cofactors including K factors, P factors, Tyrosinase, Ascorbigen and more.

MORE EFFECTIVE THAN SYNTHETIC VITAMIN C: Whole food vitamin C is shown to be more bioavailable and effective than synthetic vitamin C as ascorbic acid. Long term use of synthetic, chemically derived vitamin C has been linked to negative health effects. Plant-C is a natural and safe form of vitamin C that can be taken everyday because it is vitamin C from real fruit.

USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC, MADE IN USA, 3RD PARTY TESTED: Plant-C is organically certified by the USDA and exceeds all vegan standards. It is GMO-free, soy-free, gluten-free, preservative-free, additive-free. It is produced in a cGMP & organic certified facility in the USA and is 3rd party tested for over 100+ toxins or microbials

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like it. I got exactly what I ordered. Love the heavy duty glass bottle. I absolutely love the old school brown bottles, they are my favorite. Definitely can reuse/repurpose it after using it all. I also love that it's a 3 month supply so I don't have to order every month. Make it's easier for my life for sure. I also like that the pills are super easy to swallow. Sometimes the vegetables capsules can get stuck in my throat or stick together which causes problems for me. So the way they are make it so much easier to take. I like the price that they are , very reasonable for a 3 month supply. Overall I'm pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality Vitamin C but not a great filler
reviews.reviewText: It's really hard to find a vitamin C that's not from absorbic acid. Which from the studies I've read are quite ineffective. Its always better to find a natural form and this looks like a good one.Apart from the whole source of vitamin C it has rice hull and pullulan which Im not sure where it derives from but I don't think it's natural so I don't know why the ingredients list it as organic pullulan. What I understand about it, is that its not absorbed by the body but the question is why add it? Maybe its there as a preservative but still one a very pure ingredient is worthy of a 5 star.In saying that. I would rather take this than any absorbic acid vitamin C.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for its organic ingredients from fruits and no chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Whole Food Nutrition
reviews.reviewText: Ever since I read that most Vitamin C supplements are simply Ascorbic Acid – which is the part of Vitamin C which keeps it from spoiling, sort of a preservative – I’ve been interested in a whole food version.Here in my 7th decade I’ve become much more aware of how nutritional supplements help with overall activity levels and health. Vitamin C, in particular, helps my healing and skin condition.Food-derived Vitamin C has been shown to be much richer in micronutrients, fiber and even to be better used by the body. It also works with other vitamins to improve their contributions to health.The feature part of the review asked about the taste. I’m not certain what they are looking for. This is a gel cap, there’s basically no taste – although maybe that was the point? I like the Vitamin C tablets that taste like a sweet tart, but these are gel caps.When I ran across this Vitamin C I decided it was time to give it a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a fantastic way to support your immune system
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely thrilled to share my experience with Organic Vitamin C, particularly the Plant-C supplement. Here's why I think it's truly exceptional: First and foremost, these capsules are incredibly easy to swallow, with no unpleasant aftertaste. This makes incorporating them into my daily routine a breeze.Now, let's talk about the price. It's not just good; it's an incredible value. For the quality and concentration of vitamin C you're getting, it's a real steal. One more thing that's worth mentioning is that whole food vitamin C, like the one in Plant-C, has been shown to be more bioavailable and effective than synthetic vitamin C. So not only are you getting a high-quality product, but it's also more natural and safe for everyday use. In summary, I can't recommend Organic Vitamin C, especially the Plant-C supplement, enough. It's a fantastic way to support your immune system, benefit from antioxidants, and promote overall health. The fact that it's derived from organic fruits and comes at such a reasonable price makes it a no-brainer for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Organic and whole food vitamin c supplement
reviews.reviewText: This brand of organic whole food vitamin c comes in capsule form.I'm waiting to see the results but I really like the ingredients and the fact that it is organic.I eat very little and vitamin c type foods and this time of year it is important for the immune system.It's easy on my stomach.There is a full 90-day supply in this bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Whole Food Vitamin-C - Not Ascorbic Acid!
reviews.reviewText: So far so good! I've been wanting to get more vitamin-C but ascorbic acid which is synthetic vitamin-C doesn't really work for me. I was excited to see this whole food vitamin-C and thought I would give it a try.I cannot say I have so far felt any benefit from taking it however unlike ascorbic acid, I tolerate this very well with no negative side effects and get no strange aftertaste during or after taking. I really love the quality standards used to make these and will continue to take them. I also like the reasonable price they are offered at. I really think I finally found my go-to vitamin-c with these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Organic Whole Food Vitamin C - Made in the USA, 3rd Party Tested
reviews.reviewText: It's great to find an Organic Vitamin C derived from Organic fruit. It may not be ultra high in milligrams, but since it is 100% whole food and not synthetic, it's more bioavailable. They state that 250mg equals four oranges which isn't to shabby. I also appreciate this product is 3rd party tested, GMO free, Soy free, Made in the USA, Sugar Free, Manufactured in a cGMP certified facility, and includes co-factors like Bioflavonoids and Rutin. There are also no additives, no preservatives, or fillers. One bottle provides a 90 day serving unless you take more than one capsule a day. I'm always on the lookout for a high quality C supplement, and this exceeded my expectations by being a whole food, Organic version of Vitamin C.
